I tried to launch Heritrix from Windows 2000 command line across the 
command:
java -jar heritrix-1.4.0.jar

But received the following message:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/
commons/httpclient/URIException

I have already set HERITRIX_HOME to the system environment and what is 
going wrong then? Thanks!
